scripts.build-dist: npm run build-dist:clean && npm run build-dist:ngc && npm run build-dist:bundles && npm run build-dist:schematics && npm run build-dist:package
scripts.build-dist:ngc: echo "Transpiling TypeScript files and preparing for AoT compilation...\n" && ngc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.build-dist:bundles: echo "Creating UMD bundles...\n" && webpack --config webpack.prod.config.js && uglifyjs dist/bundles/ngx-onsenui.umd.js --screw-ie8 --compress --mangle --comments --output dist/bundles/ngx-onsenui.umd.min.js --source-map dist/bundles/ngx-onsenui.umd.min.js.map
scripts.build-dist:schematics: echo "Building schematics...\n" && tsc -p schematics/tsconfig.json && rsync -a schematics/src/. dist/schematics --include *.d.ts --include files/**/*.ts --exclude *.ts
scripts.build-dist:package: echo "Preparing npm package metadata...\n" && cp package-dist.json dist/package.json && cp README-dist.md dist/README.md && cp CHANGELOG.md dist
